TextLibrary.Text: Staf
Wait! Stop!
Wait! Stop!
Wait! Stop!
Wait! Stop!
I hope you're not about to tell me that I can't meet with your Chieftain.
I hope you're not about to tell me that I can't meet with your Chieftain.
I hope you're not about to tell me that I can't meet with your Chieftain.
I hope you're not about to tell me that I can't meet with your Chieftain.
Hahahaha! I am Staf, second-in-charge of Hyaan. You are very smart! And the answer to your question is yes... and no!
Hahahaha! I am Staf, second-in-charge of Hyaan. You are very smart! And the answer to your question is yes... and no!
Hahahaha! I am Staf, second-in-charge of Hyaan. You are very smart! And the answer to your question is yes... and no!
Hahahaha! I am Staf, second-in-charge of Hyaan. You are very smart! And the answer to your question is yes... and no!
Which is it? Can I meet with your Chieftain or not?
Which is it? Can I meet with your Chieftain or not?
Which is it? Can I meet with your Chieftain or not?
Which is it? Can I meet with your Chieftain or not?
Not this Chieftain, no. He is very rude. Rude and cruel. He will not talk with you. But I have a plan...
Not this Chieftain, no. He is very rude. Rude and cruel. He will not talk with you. But I have a plan...
Not this Chieftain, no. He is very rude. Rude and cruel. He will not talk with you. But I have a plan...
Not this Chieftain, no. He is very rude. Rude and cruel. He will not talk with you. But I have a plan...
I'm sure you do.
I'm sure you do.
I'm sure you do.
I'm sure you do.
Challenge him to a fight. If you defeat him, I will be Chieftain, and I will talk with you. You are my friend!
Challenge him to a fight. If you defeat him, I will be Chieftain, and I will talk with you. You are my friend!
Challenge him to a fight. If you defeat him, I will be Chieftain, and I will talk with you. You are my friend!
Challenge him to a fight. If you defeat him, I will be Chieftain, and I will talk with you. You are my friend!
Don't take this the wrong way, Staf, but I don't need to talk to you. I just want to trade for a certain tooth that your Chieftain has.
Don't take this the wrong way, Staf, but I don't need to talk to you. I just want to trade for a certain tooth that your Chieftain has.
Don't take this the wrong way, Staf, but I don't need to talk to you. I just want to trade for a certain tooth that your Chieftain has.
Don't take this the wrong way, Staf, but I don't need to talk to you. I just want to trade for a certain tooth that your Chieftain has.
His lucky tooth? He will not trade that. No. Never. You defeat him, though, and I will give you the tooth. Yours! To keep!

His lucky tooth? He will not trade that. No. Never. You defeat him, though, and I will give you the tooth. Yours! To keep!
